# MarketplaceV3DirectListings.approveBuyerForReservedListing() method

Approve buyer for a reserved direct listing

## Example

```javascript
// The listing ID of the direct listing you want approve buyer for
const listingId = "0";

await contract.directListings.approveBuyerForReservedListing(
  listingId,
  "{{wallet_address}}",
);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
approveBuyerForReservedListing(listingId: BigNumberish, buyer: string): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description                     |
| --------- | ------------ | ------------------------------- |
| listingId | BigNumberish | The listing id to buy           |
| buyer     | string       | Address of buyer being approved |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;

## Remarks

Approve a buyer to buy from a reserved listing.
